programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Going Off With A Bang / Talent For Trouble - Steel and the Deer Squad want to organise a surprise party for Professor Scratch's birthday but the twins almost ruin the party. // To win the big talent show, Stu and Safia get Professor Scratch to programme Dinobot to obey their every command.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Knightly Quest - Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep412
programme.desc: Pups Party with Bats - Bats are drawn from their cave by DJ Rubble's new dance track.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Doctor Drama / The White Whale - After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitn Calavera!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Mother's Day on the High Seas - It's the Annual Mother's Day Race and Santi is competing with Mami, but Enrique plans to cheat his way to victory.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Knightly Quest - Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceaera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Save the Planet / Keytar All-Star / The Adventures of Randy Rock - Bossy and Turtle come up with a plan to catch someone who is not being envrionmentally friendly. // Bossy wants to perform a keytar solo but does not want to practice. // Turtle doesn't know how to best enjoy time with the class pet rock.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep423
programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day - Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay. // Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The PAW Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Three - LaaLaa has fun counting to three; 1, 2, 3 rabbits, 1, 2, 3 flowers and 1, 2, 3 trees! Laa-Laa even counts three Teletubbies; Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Zebra - Dee encourages a friend to say 'zebra' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We meet a striped zebra, a spiky hair zebra, a lazing zebra, a zooming zebra and a baby zebra.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Sports Day - It's Pop Paper City Sports Day and Mae-Mae is the Sports Day judge, but can she decide on the right winner?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep39
programme.desc: A Case of the Lightnings - Messy and friends visit Fluff the Cloud's family, and things heat up in flash when her brother Nimby gets the lightnings.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Cubby House - Monty is disappointed to find the cubby house Stan built him is empty inside, until he begins to fill it with his imagination.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep31
programme.desc: The Getting Ready Badge - The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep40
programme.desc: The Imagination Badge - When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep39
programme.desc: The Recipe Badge - The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Dance Mode - After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Andy and the Weedy Sea Dragon - When Andy finds a newly hatched weedy sea dragon, will he manage to snap the perfect photo of it and make it back before the opening of the exhibition?

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Safety Machines - Grace looks at three amazing safety machines: a road cone layer, a road marking removal truck and a road lane changer.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S5 Ep6
programme.desc: Bad Loser - Captain Captain is in her usual competitive mood, and she is determined not to lose any of the jewels today.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun! When Tag starts to feel a little bit seasick Duggee suggests a stop off at the Island for a spot of lunch, but where's all the food?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - When the Squirrels start talking to each other in the wrong voices it's clear something has gone awry. But Duggee has his voice badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are preparing to have a campfire. Duggee is getting it ready and needs the Squirrels to help find lots of wood for it.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep2
programme.desc: Toby and Bash - Bash is rewarded by the Fat Controller for being a Really Useful Engine. His prize is to spend the day with Toby. Bash enjoys himself so much that Toby thinks his friend would like to live on Sodor.

programme.desc: Outside Outside - The Shallots want to explore beyond the front garden, so Sarah comes up with a plan...

programme.desc: Daredevil Dude - Monty ponders whether all heroes have to solve big problems or if there are some superheroes who focus on smaller tasks.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: 2332 Kembara Kenali Borneo
programme.desc: Dokumentari Khas ini memaparkan pengalaman Rombongan Diraja, Yang di-Pertuan Agong Al Sultan Abdullah Riayatuddin Al Mustafa Billah Shah dan Raja Permaisuri Agong Tengku Azizah Aminah Maimunah Iskandariah dalam perjalanan epik Kembara Kenali Borneo pada September 2023. Sejarah terpahat apabila Baginda berdua merupakan pimpinan tertinggi negara yang pertama berkenan mengadakan lawatan ke negeri yang terletak di kepulauan Borneo melalui lebuhraya Pan Borneo, merangkumi jarak perjalanan sejauh 2,332 kilometer. Bermula di Tawau, Sabah sehingga ke Kuching, Sarawak -- Kembara Kenali Borneo menjadi manifestasi keprihatian Rombongan Diraja terhadap kehidupan masyarakat, dan perkara ini juga dibuktikan melalui sambutan meriah rakyat yang pertama kali bertentang mata dengan Baginda berdua.

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku (Rpt)
programme.desc: Kebawah Duli Yang Maha Mulia Seri Paduka Baginda Yang di-Pertuan Agong ke-XVI Al-Sultan Abdullah telah hampir lima tahun memegang tampuk kepimpinan negara sejak 31 Januari 2019. Duli-duli Yang Maha Mulia Tuanku Yang di-Pertuan Agong dan Raja Permaisuri Agong amat dikenali sebagai Raja berjiwa rakyat dan sentiasa mengambil berat tentang permasalahan rakyat selain menyantuni rakyat yang menjadi mangsa bencana, dalam apa jua keadaan sekalipun. Kini lima tahun kemudianrata-rata rakyat merafakkan sembah Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku.

programme.desc: New Yorks Madison Square Garden hosted a rematch between Thug Rose Namajunas and Zhang Weili at UFC 268. See both women train and prepare for battle once again to decide the queen of the strawweight division.

programme.desc: Get a detailed look at the debut day of Irish sensation Ian Garry. UFCs top stars pay tribute to an Octagon Icon - Georges St-Pierre. Dominick Cruz picks his favorite title fights from the WEC era. And Jan Blachowicz visits troops on a Polish military base.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC278UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between welterweight champion Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and rival Leon Rocky Edwards. Plus, Luke Rockhold returned to action to face Paulo Costa. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. programme.title: UFC Fight Night Ankalaev vs Walker 2
programme.desc: Prelims - A controversial score will be settled at the APEX in Las Vegas on January 14, and this time, light heavyweight contenders Magomed Ankalaev and Johnny Walker will have five rounds to handle their business in a UFC Fight Night main event.
